stateDiagram

DEFEAT

DEFEAT : DEFEAT

DEFEAT : enter / #123; defeatedMario()#59; #125;

state REGULAR {

        SMALL

        SMALL : SMALL

        SMALL : enter / #123; smallMario()#59; #125;

        SUPER

        SUPER : SUPER

        SUPER : enter / #123; superMario()#59; #125;

        FIRE

        FIRE : FIRE

        FIRE : enter / #123; fireMario()#59; #125;

        CAPE

        CAPE : CAPE

        CAPE : enter / #123; capeMario()#59; #125;

        state "$initial_state" as REGULAR.(InitialState)

        state "$H" as REGULAR.(History)

}

INVINCIBLE

INVINCIBLE : INVINCIBLE

INVINCIBLE : enter / #123; starMario()#59; #125;

INVINCIBLE : enter / #123; startStarTimer()#59; #125;

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

DEFEAT --> SMALL : MUSHROOM

REGULAR --> INVINCIBLE : STAR

SMALL --> SUPER : MUSHROOM

SMALL --> FIRE : FIRE_FLOWER

SMALL --> CAPE : FEATHER

SMALL --> DEFEAT : HIT

SUPER --> FIRE : FIRE_FLOWER

SUPER --> CAPE : FEATHER

SUPER --> SMALL : HIT

FIRE --> CAPE : FEATHER

FIRE --> SUPER : HIT

CAPE --> FIRE : FIRE_FLOWER

CAPE --> SUPER : HIT

REGULAR.(InitialState) --> REGULAR.(History)

REGULAR.(History) --> SMALL

INVINCIBLE --> REGULAR : do [isStarExpired()]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> REGULAR
Events
settings
